attributes.action: Stop the Mayor of London to end travelcards
attributes.additional_details: Stop the Mayor of London to cancel travel cards into London. This will put a strain on commuters as we will have to pay National Rail fees on top of TfL charges.
attributes.background:
Stop the Mayor of London to cancel London Travelcards as this will put a strain on commuters.

Travel is already costing us commuters a significant amount of money.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of Transport for London, the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
